mapper.select: select VACATION_CAT_NO as catNo, VACATION_CAT_NAME as catName, VACATION_MINUS_DAYS as minusDays, VACATION_MINUS_TIMES as minusTimes, VACATION_DESCRIPTION as description, VACATION_USED as used from VACATION_CATEGORIES where VACATION_USED = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
select VACATION_REQUEST_HISTORIES_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into vacation_request_histories (VACATION_REQUEST_NO, VACATION_START_DATE, VACATION_END_DATE, VACATION_START_HOUR, VACATION_END_HOUR, VACATION_NOTE, VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE, VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS, VACATION_CAT_NO, VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO, VACATION_APPROVAL_EMP_NO) values (#{requestNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startHour}, #{endHour}, #{note}, #{requestType}, #{approvalStatus}, #{catNo}, #{requestEmpNo}, #{approvalEmpNo})
mapper.select: select VACATION_REQUEST_NO as requestNo, VACATION_START_DATE as startDate, VACATION_END_DATE as endDate, VACATION_START_HOUR as startHour, VACATION_END_HOUR as endHour, VACATION_NOTE as note, VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE as requestType, VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS as approvalStatus, VACATION_CAT_NO as catNo, VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO as requestEmpNo, VACATION_APPROVAL_EMP_NO as approvalEmpNo, VACATION_CREATED_DATE as createdDate, VACATION_UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate from VACATION_REQUEST_HISTORIES where VACATION_REQUEST_NO = #{value}

select A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO as "vacReqHistories.requestNo", A.VACATION_START_DATE as "vacReqHistories.startDate", A.VACATION_END_DATE as "vacReqHistories.endDate", A.VACATION_START_HOUR as "vacReqHistories.startHour", A.VACATION_END_HOUR as "vacReqHistories.endHour", A.VACATION_NOTE as "vacReqHistories.note", A.VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE as "vacReqHistories.requestType", A.VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS as "vacReqHistories.approvalStatus", A.VACATION_CAT_NO as "vacReqHistories.catNo", A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO as "vacReqHistories.requestEmpNo", A.VACATION_APPROVAL_EMP_NO as "vacReqHistories.approvalEmpNo", B.VACATION_CAT_NAME as "vacCategories.catName" from VACATION_REQUEST_HISTORIES A, VACATION_CATEGORIES B where A.VACATION_CAT_NO = B.VACATION_CAT_NO and A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO = #{empNo} and A.VACATION_START_DATE between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and A.VACATION_END_DATE between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO as "vacReqHistories.requestNo", A.VACATION_START_DATE as "vacReqHistories.startDate", A.VACATION_END_DATE as "vacReqHistories.endDate", A.VACATION_START_HOUR as "vacReqHistories.startHour", A.VACATION_END_HOUR as "vacReqHistories.endHour", A.VACATION_NOTE as "vacReqHistories.note", A.VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE as "vacReqHistories.requestType", A.VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS as "vacReqHistories.approvalStatus", A.VACATION_CAT_NO as "vacReqHistories.catNo", A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO as "vacReqHistories.requestEmpNo", A.VACATION_APPROVAL_EMP_NO as "vacReqHistories.approvalEmpNo", B.VACATION_CAT_NAME as "vacCategories.catName" from VACATION_REQUEST_HISTORIES A, VACATION_CATEGORIES B where A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO = #{value} and A.VACATION_CAT_NO = B.VACATION_CAT_NO

select A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO as requestNo, A.VACATION_START_DATE as startDate, A.VACATION_END_DATE as endDate, A.VACATION_START_HOUR as startHour, A.VACATION_END_HOUR as endHour, A.VACATION_NOTE as note, A.VACATION_CAT_NO as catNo, A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO as empNo, B.VACATION_CAT_NAME as catName, B.VACATION_MINUS_DAYS as minusDays, B.VACATION_MINUS_TIMES as minusTimes, C.EMPLOYEE_NAME as empName from VACATION_REQUEST_HISTORIES A, VACATION_CATEGORIES B, EMPLOYEES C where A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO = #{value} and A.VACATION_CAT_NO = B.VACATION_CAT_NO and A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO = C.EMPLOYEE_NO

SELECT VACATION_REQUEST_NO AS requestNo, VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE AS requestType, VACATION_START_DATE AS startDate, VACATION_END_DATE AS endDate, VACATION_START_HOUR AS startHour, VACATION_END_HOUR AS endHour, VACATION_NOTE AS note, VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS AS approvalStatus, VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO AS empNo, VACATION_CAT_NO AS catNo, VACATION_CAT_NAME AS catName, VACATION_MINUS_DAYS AS minusDays, VACATION_MINUS_TIMES AS minusTimes, EMPLOYEE_NAME AS empName FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO DESC) ROW_NUMBERS, A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO, A.VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE, A.VACATION_START_DATE, A.VACATION_END_DATE, A.VACATION_START_HOUR, A.VACATION_END_HOUR, A.VACATION_NOTE, A.VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS, A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO, A.VACATION_CAT_NO, B.VACATION_CAT_NAME, B.VACATION_MINUS_DAYS, B.VACATION_MINUS_TIMES, C.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM VACATION_REQUEST_HISTORIES A, VACATION_CATEGORIES B, EMPLOYEES C WHERE A.VACATION_CAT_NO = B.VACATION_CAT_NO and A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO = C.EMPLOYEE_NO and A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO = #{requestEmpNo} ) WHERE ROW_NUMBERS BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT VACATION_REQUEST_NO AS requestNo, VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE AS requestType, VACATION_START_DATE AS startDate, VACATION_END_DATE AS endDate, VACATION_START_HOUR AS startHour, VACATION_END_HOUR AS endHour, VACATION_NOTE AS note, VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS AS approvalStatus, VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO AS empNo, VACATION_CAT_NO AS catNo, VACATION_CAT_NAME AS catName, VACATION_MINUS_DAYS AS minusDays, VACATION_MINUS_TIMES AS minusTimes, EMPLOYEE_NAME AS empName FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO DESC) ROW_NUMBERS, A.VACATION_REQUEST_NO, A.VACATION_REQUEST_TYPE, A.VACATION_START_DATE, A.VACATION_END_DATE, A.VACATION_START_HOUR, A.VACATION_END_HOUR, A.VACATION_NOTE, A.VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS, A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO, A.VACATION_CAT_NO, B.VACATION_CAT_NAME, B.VACATION_MINUS_DAYS, B.VACATION_MINUS_TIMES, C.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM VACATION_REQUEST_HISTORIES A, VACATION_CATEGORIES B, EMPLOYEES C WHERE A.VACATION_CAT_NO = B.VACATION_CAT_NO and A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO = C.EMPLOYEE_NO and A.VACATION_APPROVAL_STATUS = '승인됨' and A.VACATION_REQUEST_EMP_NO = #{requestEmpNo} ) WHERE ROW_NUMBERS BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT EMPLOYEE_NO AS empNo, TOTAL_YEAR_VACATION_COUNT AS totalCount, USED_YEAR_VACATION_COUNT AS usedCount, RE_MAINING_YEAR_VACATION_COUNT AS remainingCount FROM EMPLOYEE_YEAR_VACATIONS WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = #{value}
